:::Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion:::

Ratchet: Well, thats our third base i beleive.  We started out at the Ark, 
but no matter how hard we tried, we couldnt keep it standing with the 
constant attacks by various factions and it was destroyed.  By that time the 
CF, which was at that time the most powerful Maximal battle cruiser was on 
Earth and everybody moved there.  It suffered pretty much the same fate as 
the ark, and here we are, Maximal City.
Sideswipe: yeah, reminds me of the time back in the Great War when we pretty 
much left the Ark and moved to Metroplex.  But we haven't been doing well at 
all since all the factions started trying to destroy us.
Orion: I got the feeling things are going to get better. Whose idea was this 
city thing?

--part1_98.15306674.283b204c_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
